sense.def:
Kadar obstaja
a tendency for something
, se nekaj začne dogajati pogosteje ali v večjem obsegu.

seg.quote: There is a growing tendency for people to opt out.

sense.def:
To have a tendency
pomeni, da obstaja velika verjetnost, da se bo nekdo vedel na določen način.

seg.quote: I have a tendency to tease.
The girl might have murderous tendencies.
